channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It Ends With Us Controversy Fuels: Blake Lively Sues Director & Star Justin Baldoni For Sexual Harassment
item.description: The controversy surrounding It Ends with Us is growing worse as Blake Lively is suing director and star Justin Baldoni for sexual harassment.

item.title: The DCU Just Used The Death Of Superman Before His Movie Even Releases
item.description: The DCU may have a Superman movie on its way, but another DCU project has already introduced the acclaimed “Death of Superman” story from the comics.

item.title: 2024's Best Batman Release Has Convinced Me That Two Of The DCU's Riskiest Upcoming Movies Are Perfect For The Franchise's Future
item.description: The enormous success of The Penguin has me convinced that two surprising DCU movies have the potential to be some of the franchise’s best projects.
